title: British Tourists Encounter Tropical Depression Imelda on Road Trip Through Texas
text:
British tourists on a road trip to Miami found themselves in the path of Tropical Depression Imelda on September 19 as it brought heavy rainfall to Beaumont, Texas.

“Here from the UK on a road trip to Miami. Stopped here last night for a quick sleep … woke up to this,” ‎Justin Griffiths‎ wrote to Beaumont news outlet KFDM News. “This is us walking from the store to get supplies.”

A flash flood emergency was declared for a number of towns in southeastern Texas on Thursday. The Beaumont Police Department said it had received over 590 calls related to the flooding.

This footage was filmed on the Interstate 10 Access Road outside Americas Best Value Inn Beaumont. Credit: ‎Justin Griffiths via Storyful
